dct_title_s: Geography : to the Rt. Honble. George Berkeley, Ld. Berkeley ... anno Dom. 1678
dct_description_sm: Double hemispherical world map showing California as an island, surrounded by illustrations of types of measurement and the branches of geography. Plate 104 from: The gentlemans recreation ... London : Printed by S. Roycroft for Richard Blome ... , 1686.
dct_publisher_sm: [London : Printed by S. Roycroft, for Richard Blome, dwelling at the upper end of Dutchy-Lane, near Somerset-House in the Strand, 1686]
